alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 1:53PM EDT until July 02 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in central Kentucky... Central Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... * Until 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/. * At 153 PM EDT/1253 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Hardinsburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hardinsburg, Webster, Irvington, Mystic, Raymond, Frymire, Sample, Clifton Mills, Ammons and Haysville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
